meanings.sent1: The movie had a lot of stupids characters who kept making silly mistakes.
meanings.sent2: It was a stupids decision to go out without an umbrella in the rain.
meanings.sent3: The teacher couldn't help but chuckle at the stupids mistake the student made on the test.
meanings.sent4: Her choice of words was so stupids that it left everyone in the room speechless.
meanings.sent5: The warning signs were clear, but their stupids actions led to trouble.

meanings.sent1: The stupids in the class always seemed to find themselves in funny situations.

meanings.sent3: The group of stupids at the party made everyone laugh with their antics.
